component.name: Data Guardian
component.summary: Your personal, vigilant backup assistant for Linux desktops

description.p: Data Guardian is a powerful Python-based backup solution designed to keep your important files, settings, and applications safe with minimal effort. It combines an intelligent daemon, a modern GTK4-based GUI, and advanced backup strategies to deliver a seamless, reliable data protection experience.

ul.li: Automatic & Incremental Backups: Effortless, continuous protection with intelligent versioning.
Smart & Selective Backup: Configure exclusions for directories, file types, or hidden files.
External Drive Integration: Detects and backs up to your selected external storage.
Robust Backup Integrity: Uses SHA-256 hashing, size, and modification time checks. Resilient to interruptions.
Comprehensive Application Backup: Saves a list of installed Flatpak applications.
Modern, User-Friendly GUI: Built with GTK4 and Libadwaita for intuitive control.
Resilient & Configurable Daemon: Handles signals, device changes, and offers detailed logging.

description.p: Initial development release. Under active development, use with caution.
